Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cpnv.vox.meteor_destroy.states.State
      • ch.cpnv.vox.meteor_destroy.states.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class GameState
extends State
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    The Game State is the principal state, we play the game on this one.
